channel.title: CreationX | NEW | Impeccable Pking & Combat | Join Now
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.creation-x.net/forum/images/bluefox_ambient/misc/images/logo.png[/img]
[b]Home:[/b] [url=http://www.creation-x.net]CreationX[/url]
[b]Play now:[/b] [url=http://www.creation-x.net/CreationX.jar]http://www.creation-x.net/CreationX.jar[/url]
We're a new runescape private server and we're going to get big soon. The server is based on zanaris/estrania, credits go to arrowzflame for the original source and randqm for amending and implementing numerous updates.
Features:
- Fun Pk, Multi Pk, Mage Bank, 44 Portals, Varrock Pk, Edgeville, Wilderness Agility! - Dungeoneering - Summoning - 70% of summoning specs work - Overloads - Hit effects such as Divine reducing Damage - Rewards for fight pits enhance exp - Good eco - 14+ Boss's - TriviaBot to make server much fun - Clipped npcs and players - BoB summoning - Duel arena - Much more join now!

item.dc:creator: @malaheem93 CreationX93
item.description:
@malaheem93 wrote:

[center]

Home: CreationX

Play now: http://www.creation-x.net/CreationX.jar

We’re a new runescape private server and we’re going to get big soon. The server is based on zanaris/estrania, credits go to arrowzflame for the original source and randqm for amending and implementing numerous updates.

Features:

  • Fun Pk, Multi Pk, Mage Bank, 44 Portals, Varrock Pk, Edgeville, Wilderness Agility!
  • Dungeoneering
  • Summoning
  • 70% of summoning specs work
  • Overloads
  • Hit effects such as Divine reducing Damage
  • Rewards for fight pits enhance exp
  • Good eco
  • 14+ Boss’s
  • TriviaBot to make server much fun
  • Clipped npcs and players
  • BoB summoning
  • Duel arena
  • Much more join now!

[/center]
